solution_line_template: She gave out {initial_stickers} - {stickers_left_over} = <<{initial_stickers}-{stickers_left_over}={stickers_given_out}>>{stickers_given_out} stickers in total.
She gave {stickers_per_friend} * {number_of_friends} = <<{stickers_per_friend}*{number_of_friends}={stickers_to_friends}>>{stickers_to_friends} stickers to her friends.
She gave out {stickers_given_out} - {stickers_to_friends} = <<{stickers_given_out}-{stickers_to_friends}={stickers_to_rest_of_class}>>{stickers_to_rest_of_class} stickers to the rest of the class.

This means there are {stickers_to_rest_of_class} / {stickers_per_other_student} = <<{stickers_to_rest_of_class}/{stickers_per_other_student}={other_students}>>{other_students} other students in the class.
There are a total of {mary} + {number_of_friends} + {other_students} = <<{mary}+{number_of_friends}+{other_students}={total_students_in_class}>>{total_students_in_class} students in the class.
